variables.hero_title: The perfect real estate for you is already prepared
variables.hero_text: Ready-made website themes that will turn into your store in a few steps. Upgrade your business with KP.City.
variables.services_text: Choose a template that will give your store a clean and modern look, allowing your products to appear more appealing and capture customers attention.
